articles.title: Anand Mahindra offers job to girl who saved infant niece from monkey using Alexa, says ‘Technology enabler of ingenuity’ | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Anand Mahindra mused that the ‘dominant question’ this era is whether humans will become slaves or masters of technology, adding that 13-year-old Nikita's quick thinking ‘provides comfort that technology will always be an enabler of human ingenuity’
articles.content: Industrialist Anand Mahindra has praised the teenager who saved her infant niece and herself from a monkey attack using Amazon's Alexa for displaying "extraordinary quick thinking" and offered her a … [+2393 chars]

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: US avoids 'digital security crisis' after developer uncovers sabotage in software - Fox News
articles.description: A Microsoft software developer reportedly uncovered a deliberate act of sabotage within a program, sparking alarm among tech leaders and U.S. government officials.
articles.content:
• The U.S. is grappling with significant cybersecurity concerns after a developer uncovered an act of sabotage within a program.
